|<span data-ttu-id="7451e-3945">更改</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-3945">Change</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-3946">beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-3946">beta</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="7451e-3947">现有策略集将替换为[策略](/graph/api/resources/policy-overview?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) URL 段。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-3949">This update adds four typed policy resources:</span></span> <br> <li>[<span data-ttu-id="7451e-3950">activityBasedTimeoutPolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-3950">activityBasedTimeoutPolicies</span></span>](/graph/api/resources/activityBasedTimeoutPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)</li> <li>[<span data-ttu-id="7451e-3952">[homeRealmDiscoveryPolicies](/graph/api/resources/homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) 和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-3952">[homeRealmDiscoveryPolicies](/graph/api/resources/homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) and</span></span> </li> <li>[<span | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-3954">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-3954">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-3955">beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-3955">beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-3956">对于支持基于活动的超时功能的应用程序，添加的 [activityBasedTimeoutPolicy](/graph/api/resources/activityBasedTimeoutPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) 资源类型控制着一段时间不活动后 Web 会话的自动注销。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-3956">Added [activityBasedTimeoutPolicy](/graph/api/resources/activityBasedTimeoutPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) resource type controls automatic sign-out for web sessions after a period of inactivity, for applications that support activity-based timeout functionality.</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-3957">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-3957">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-3958">beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-3958">beta</span></span> |<span data-ttu-id="7451e-3959">[claimsMappingPolicy](/graph/api/resources/claimsMappingPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) 资源类型控制用于 WS-AT、SAML、OAuth 2.0 和 OpenID Connect 协议的声明映射，适用于向特定应用程序发出的令牌。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-3959">[claimsMappingPolicy](/graph/api/resources/claimsMappingPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) resource type controls the claims mapping for WS-Fed, SAML, OAuth 2.0, and OpenID Connect protocols, for tokens issued to a specific application.</span></span>|

| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5623">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5623">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5624">Beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5624">Beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5625">引入了新的工作区智能[分析 API](/graph/api/resources/useranalytics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)，可便于分析用户如何在工作时间内和工作时间之外的各种活动上花费时间，包括电话、聊天（即时消息）、电子邮件、专注工作和会议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5625">Introduced the new workplace intelligence [analytics API](/graph/api/resources/useranalytics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) that enables you to get analytics about how users spend their time on various activities during and outside of working hours, including calls, chats (instant messages), emails, focus work, and meetings.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5626">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5626">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5627">Beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5627">Beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5628">引入了新的工作区智能[设置 API](/graph/api/resources/settings?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)，表示用户使用[分析 API](/graph/api/resources/useranalytics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) 所需的当前设置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5628">Introduced the new workplace intelligence [settings API](/graph/api/resources/settings?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) that represents the current required settings for a user to use the [analytics API](/graph/api/resources/useranalytics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true).</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5629">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5629">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5630">Beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5630">Beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5631">引入了新的 [activityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/activitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) 资源类型及其派生的以下新资源类型：[callActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/callactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)、[chatActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/chatactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)、[emailActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/emailactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)、[focusActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/focusactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) 和 [meetingActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/meetingactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5631">Introduced the new [activityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/activitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) resource type and the following new resource types that are derived from it: [callActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/callactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true), [chatActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/chatactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true),[emailActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/emailactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true), [focusActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/focusactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true), and [meetingActivityStatistics](/graph/api/resources/meetingactivitystatistics?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true).</span></span> |

| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5776">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5776">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5777">Beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5777">Beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5778">添加了 [新的委派和应用程序权限](/graph/permissions-reference?#organization-permissions) _Organization.Read.All_ 和 _Organization.ReadWrite.All_，以获取并更新 [组织 API](/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) 资源以及获取 [subcribedSku](/graph/api/resources/subscribedSku?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) 资源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5778">Added [new delegated and application permissions](/graph/permissions-reference?#organization-permissions) _Organization.Read.All_ and _Organization.ReadWrite.All_ to get and update the [organization API](/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) resource and get the [subcribedSku](/graph/api/resources/subscribedSku?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) resource.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5779">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5779">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5780">v1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5780">v1.0</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5781">在[组](/graph/api/group-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true)中添加了 [group:validateProperties 函数](/graph/api/group-validateproperties?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true)和 [directoryobject:validateProperties 函数](/graph/api/group-validateproperties?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true)，用于验证 Microsoft 365 组的显示名称或邮件别名是否符合命名策略。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5781">Added the [group:validateProperties function](/graph/api/group-validateproperties?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true) and [directoryobject:validateProperties function](/graph/api/group-validateproperties?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true) on [groups](/graph/api/group-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true), which validates that a Microsoft 365 group's display name or mail nickname complies with naming policies.</span></span> |

| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5797">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5797">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5798">Beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5798">Beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5799">向 [目录](/graph/api/resources/directory?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)资源添加了新的资源类型 [**featureRolloutPolicy**](/graph/api/resources/featureRolloutPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5799">Added new resource type [**featureRolloutPolicy**](/graph/api/resources/featureRolloutPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) to the [directory](/graph/api/resources/directory?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) resource.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7451e-5800">功能推出策略可帮助租户管理员在为整个组织启用一些功能之前，针对特定组试用这些功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-5800">Feature rollout policy helps tenant administrators to pilot features to specific groups before enabling them for entire organization.</span></span>|

processing](/graph/api/call-cancelmediaprocessing?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true), and [subscribing to touch tone notifications](/graph/api/call-subscribetotone?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true).</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7762">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7762">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7763">Beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7763">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7764">添加了[参与者](/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)资源和用于管理音频/视频呼叫以及会议参与者的 API，包括[检索参与者对象](/graph/api/participant-get?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)、[为参与者配置音频混音器](/graph/api/participant-configuremixer?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)、静音[一个](/graph/api/participant-mute?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)或[所有](/graph/api/participant-muteall?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)参与者、[检索呼叫/会议中的参与者列表](/graph/api/call-list-participants?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)以及[邀请参与者](/graph/api/participant-invite?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)加入呼叫/会议。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7764">Added the [participant](/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) resource and APIs for managing the participants in audio/video calls and meetings, including [retrieving a participant object](/graph/api/participant-get?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true), [configuring the audio mixer for a participant](/graph/api/participant-configuremixer?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true), muting [one](/graph/api/participant-mute?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) or [all](/graph/api/participant-muteall?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) of the participants, [retrieving a list of the participants](/graph/api/call-list-participants?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) in a call/meeting, and [inviting participants](/graph/api/participant-invite?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) to a call/meeting.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7765">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7765">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7766">Beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7766">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7767">为管理和参与呼叫及会议的应用程序添加了 API，包括[共享内容](/graph/api/call-changescreensharingrole?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)、[将本身设置为静音和解除静音](/graph/api/call-unmute?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)，以及[更新与呼叫关联的元数据](/graph/api/call-updatemetadata?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)的功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7767">Added APIs for applications to manage and participate in calls and meetings, including the ability to [share content](/graph/api/call-changescreensharingrole?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true), [mute and unmute itself](/graph/api/call-unmute?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true), and [update the metadata associated with a call](/graph/api/call-updatemetadata?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true).</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7768">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7768">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7769">Beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7769">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7770">添加了[音频路由组](/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)资源和 API，用于管理多方会话参与者之间的私有音频路由，包括[创建音频路由组](/graph/api/call-post-audioroutinggroups?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)、[检索音频路由组列表](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-get?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)、[更新](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-update?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)和[删除](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-delete?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7770">Added the [audio routing group](/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) resource and APIs for managing private audio routes between participants in a multiparty conversation, including [creating audio routing groups](/graph/api/call-post-audioroutinggroups?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true), [retrieving a list of them](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-get?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true), and [updating](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-update?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) and [deleting](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-delete?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) them.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7771">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7771">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7772">Beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7772">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7773">添加了用于管理 Microsoft Teams 在线会议的[在线会议](/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)资源和 API。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7773">Added the [online meeting](/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) resource and APIs for managing Microsoft Teams online meetings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7774">最初，只有一个用于在线会议的 API，旨在[检索在线会议对象](/graph/api/onlinemeeting-get?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7774">Initially, there is only one API for online meetings, to [retrieve an online meeting object](/graph/api/onlinemeeting-get?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7775">还添加了与会议相关的[音频会议信息](/graph/api/resources/audioconferencing?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)的相关资源（例如，拨号 URL、密码和电话号码）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7775">A related resource for the [audio conference information](/graph/api/resources/audioconferencing?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) associated with a meeting (e.g. dial-in URL, passcodes, and phone numbers) was also added.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7776">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7776">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7777">Beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7777">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-7778">许多呼叫和会议 API 需要时间来完成，因此为这些长时间运行的操作添加了资源：[特定于呼叫的操作](/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)、[播放音频提示](/graph/api/resources/playpromptoperation?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)和[录制](/graph/api/resources/recordoperation?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-7778">Many of the calls and meetings APIs take time to complete, so resources for these long-running operations were added: [calling-specific operations](/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true), [playing audio prompts](/graph/api/resources/playpromptoperation?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true), and [recording](/graph/api/resources/recordoperation?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true).</span></span>  |

| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-8375">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-8375">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-8376">v1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-8376">v1.0</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-8377">向 [organization](/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) 资源添加了 **isMultipleDataLocationsForServicesEnabled** 属性，使应用能够确认已为多地理位置功能启用了某个租户。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-8377">Added the **isMultipleDataLocationsForServicesEnabled** property to the [organization](/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) resource, which allows apps to verify that a tenant is enabled for multi-geo capabilities.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7451e-8378">向 [group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) 资源添加了 **preferredDataLocation** 属性，允许为组设置首选数据位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-8378">Added the **preferredDataLocation** property to the [group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) resource, which allows for setting a preferred data location for a group.</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-8379">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-8379">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-8380">v1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-8380">v1.0</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-8381">向 [User](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true) and [Group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true) 实体添加了 [onPremisesProvisioningErrors](/graph/api/resources/onpremisesprovisioningerror?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true) 属性，表示在使用 Microsoft 同步产品（包括 Azure AD Connect、DirSync 和 MIM + 连接器），将本地目录同步到 Azure Active Directory 时发生目录同步错误。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-8381">Added  [onPremisesProvisioningErrors](/graph/api/resources/onpremisesprovisioningerror?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true) property to the [User](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true) and [Group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true) entities that represents directory synchronization errors when synchronizing on-premises directories to Azure Active Directory when using Microsoft synchronization product (including Azure AD Connect, DirSync and MIM + Connector).</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-8382">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-8382">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-8383">v1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-8383">v1.0</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-8384">向 [User](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true) 实体添加了 [onPremisesExtensionAttributes](/graph/api/resources/onpremisesextensionattributes?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true) 属性，其中包含 15 个自定义扩展属性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-8384">Added  [onPremisesExtensionAttributes](/graph/api/resources/onpremisesextensionattributes?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true) property to the [User](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true) entity that contains fifteen custom extension attribute properties.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7451e-8385">对于 onPremisesSyncEnabled 用户，此组属性在本地 Active Directory 中进行管理，并同步到 Azure AD，且为只读。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-8385">For an onPremisesSyncEnabled user, this set of properties is mastered in on-premises Active Directory and synchronized to Azure AD, and is read-only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7451e-8386">对于只使用云的用户（其中 onPremisesSyncEnabled 为 false），可以在创建或更新期间设置这些属性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-8386">For a cloud-only user (where onPremisesSyncEnabled is false), these properties may be set during creation or update.</span></span>|

| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11398">更改</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11398">Change</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11399">v1.0 和 beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11399">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11400">在用户已与登录用户共享邮件文件夹，或已将其邮箱委派给登录用户时，此行为增强功能可获取该共享邮件文件夹或其邮件内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11400">This behavior enhancement is about getting a shared mail folder or its message contents, when a user has shared a mail folder with the signed-in user, or has delegated the user's mailbox to the signed-in user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11401">在这种情况下，只要登录 用户已经向应用提供了委派权限，应用即可指定该用户的 ID 或用户主体名称来[获取该共享邮件文件夹](/graph/api/mailfolder-get?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true)，或者[获取该共享日历中的邮件](/graph/api/user-list-messages?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11401">In such situations, an app can specify that user's ID or user principal name to [get that shared mail folder](/graph/api/mailfolder-get?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true), or [get the messages in that shared calendar](/graph/api/user-list-messages?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true), as long as the signed-in user has provided delegated permissions to the app.</span></span> |

| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11512">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11512">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11513">Beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11513">Beta</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11514">向 [event](/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) 实体添加了 **locations** 属性，以支持组织与会者可以从多个位置参加的事件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11514">Added the **locations** property to the [event](/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) entity to support organizing an event that attendees can attend from more than one location.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11515">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11515">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11516">Beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11516">Beta</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11517">向 [location](/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) 复杂类型添加了 **locationType** 属性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11517">Added the **locationType** property to the [location](/graph/api/resources/location?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true) complex type.</span></span> |

| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11522">更改</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11522">Change</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11523">v1.0 和 Beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11523">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11524">在用户已与登录用户共享日历，或已将其邮箱委派给登录用户时，此行为增强功能可获取该共享日历或其事件内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11524">This behavior enhancement is about getting a shared calendar or its event contents, when a user has shared a calendar with the signed-in user, or has delegated the user's mailbox to the signed-in user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11525">在这种情况下，只要登录 用户已经向应用提供了委派权限，应用即可指定该用户的 ID 或用户主体名称来[获取该共享日历](/graph/api/calendar-get?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true)，或者[获取该共享日历中的事件](/graph/api/user-list-events?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11525">In such situations, an app can specify that user's ID or user principal name to [get that shared calendar](/graph/api/calendar-get?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true), or [get the events in that shared calendar](/graph/api/user-list-events?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true), as long as the signed-in user has provided delegated permissions to the app.</span></span> |

### <a name="personal-contacts"></a><span data-ttu-id="7451e-11757">个人联系人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11757">Personal contacts</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11758">**更改类型**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11758">**Change type**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11759">**版本**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11759">**Version**</span></span>   | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11760">**说明**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11760">**Description**</span></span>                          |
| :-------------- | :------------ | :--------------------------------------- |
| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11761">更改</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11761">Change</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11762">v1.0 和 beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11762">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11763">在用户已与登录用户共享联系人文件夹，或已将其邮箱委派给登录用户时，此行为增强功能可获取该共享联系人文件夹或其联系人内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11763">This behavior enhancement is about getting a shared contact folder or its contact contents, when a user has shared a contact folder with the signed-in user, or has delegated the user's mailbox to the signed-in user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7451e-11764">在这种情况下，只要登录 用户已经向应用提供了委派权限，应用即可指定该用户的 ID 或用户主体名称来[获取该共享联系人文件夹](/graph/api/contactfolder-get?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true)，或者[获取该共享文件夹中的联系人](/graph/api/user-list-contacts?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-11764">In such situations, an app can specify that user's ID or user principal name to [get that shared contact folder](/graph/api/contactfolder-get?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true), or [get the contacts in that shared folder](/graph/api/user-list-contacts?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true), as long as the signed-in user has provided delegated permissions to the app.</span></span> |

| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-12713">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-12713">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-12714">v1.0 和 beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-12714">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-p230">对于 **findMeetingTimes**，添加了新的枚举值 **无限制**，你可以将其指定为 **activityDomain** 属性并作为 **timeConstraint** 参数的一部分。这样 **findMeetingTimes** 可查找适合于正在安排的活动类型的时间。有关详细信息，请参阅 [请求正文](/graph/api/user-findmeetingtimes?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true#request-body)部分。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-p230">For **findMeetingTimes**, added new enum value **unrestricted** that you specify as the **activityDomain** property, part of the **timeConstraint** parameter. This lets **findMeetingTimes** look for times appropriate for the type of activity you're scheduling for. See details in the [request body](/graph/api/user-findmeetingtimes?view=graph-rest-1.0&preserve-view=true#request-body) section.</span></span> |

You can use the published APIs to write applications that retrieve and update privileged role assignments, and activate users into roles. For details, see [Microsoft Graph: Azure AD Privileged Identity Management Preview APIs available in Beta](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/microsoft-graph-azure-ad-privileged-identity-management-apis-beta/) and [Azure AD Privileged Identity Management](/graph/api/resources/privilegedidentitymanagement-root?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true).</span></span> |

### <a name="workbooks-and-charts"></a><span data-ttu-id="7451e-14236">工作簿和图表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-14236">Workbooks and charts</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-14237">**更改类型**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-14237">**Change type**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-14238">**版本**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-14238">**Version**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-14239">**说明**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-14239">**Description**</span></span>                          |
| :-------------- | :---------- | :--------------------------------------- |
| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-14240">添加项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-14240">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-14241">Beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-14241">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-p273">我们将添加新的 Excel REST API，可允许你读取和修改 Excel 工作簿中的数据。现在则可以构建智能应用，允许用户通过向数据提供见解来从存储在 Excel 工作簿中的内容获取价值。利用 Excel 的分析功能、创建表格和图表并提取视觉上吸引人的图表图像 - 这些操作均可在应用内执行。有关详细信息，请参阅 [在 Microsoft Graph 中使用 Excel](/graph/api/resources/excel?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-p273">We are adding new Excel REST APIs that let you read and modify data in an Excel workbook. It is now possible to build smart apps that allows users to get value out of the content stored in an Excel workbook by providing insights into the data. Take advantage of analytical powers of Excel, create tables and charts and extract visually appealing chart image - all from within your app. For details, see [Working with Excel in Microsoft Graph](/graph/api/resources/excel?view=graph-rest-beta&preserve-view=true).</span></span> |

For example: POST https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/Microsoft.Graph.getMemberGroups.</span></span><br/><span data-ttu-id="7451e-p276">现在不再需要此前缀（但是仍可指定此前缀）。因此，以下请求现在同样有效：POST https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/getMemberGroups。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-p276">The prefix is now no longer required (although it can still be specified). So the following would now also work: POST https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/getMemberGroups.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="7451e-14264">更改</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-14264">Change</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-14265">Beta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-14265">Beta</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="7451e-14266">清理了订阅属性名称。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7451e-14266">Cleaned up subscription property names.</span></span>  |

Initially this only template provided is to control behaviors on Office groups.</span></span> |
